quotes.quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
quotes.author: Michael Altshuler

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: For me, becoming isnâ€™t about arriving somewhere or achieving a certain aim. I see it instead as forward motion, a means of evolving, a way to reach continuously toward a better self. The journey doesn't end.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Out of the mountain of despair, a stone of hope.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: You do not find the happy life. You make it.
quotes.author: Camilla Eyring Kimball
